title: DCF
cleaned_text: Health insurance and family health resources [NJ Family Care](http://www.njfamilycare.org/default.aspx) New Jersey's publicly funded health insurance program for low income households. These links provide important information about health insurance and family health. You can also visit [New Jersey Health Link](https://www.nj.gov/health/) to find information on various health topics. [American Academy of Pediatrics](http://www.aap.org/) Information on child health topics such as [immunizations/vaccines](http://www2.aap.org/immunization/) [Healthy Children](http://www.healthychildren.org/english/Pages/default.aspx) Child development, healthy living, and health issues [American Academy of Child and Adolescent Psychiatrists](http://www.aacap.org/) Information about common mental health problems in children and adolescents as well as treatment options; links to resources, fact sheets, and other information [National Alliance on Mental Illness](https://www.nami.org/) Resources about mental illness, living with mental illness, and supporting people affected by metal illness
